lead_paragraph: In his first bout since Nov. 13, 2004, Evander Holyfield defeated Jeremy Bates on a second-round technical knockout last night in Dallas. Holyfield, 43, a four-time heavyweight champion, improved to 39-8-2. The 32-year-old Bates (21-12-2) is a full-time insurance salesman.
